alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 10:22AM CDT until May 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1021 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Piedmont, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, northwestern Edmond, Guthrie, Piedmont, Langston, Coyle, Cedar Valley, Meridian, Navina and Seward. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
